subject: Physics
question_text: In Young's double slit experiment, monochromatic light of wavelength 5000 ∘ A is used. The slits are 1 . 0   mm 1 . 0   m where intensity becomes half of the maximum intensity for the first time is ______ × 10 -6 m .

options.text: away from slits. The distance from the centre of the screen
